meanings.sent1: The new school was traditionless, with no old rules to follow.
meanings.sent2: The modern city was traditionless, embracing new ideas and ways of living.
meanings.sent3: The traditionless party had no set way of celebrating, making it unique.
meanings.sent4: Her traditionless approach to cooking led to innovative and exciting dishes.
meanings.sent5: The traditionless landscape of the moon was both eerie and fascinating.

meanings.definition: Without a history of passed-down beliefs or practices.
meanings.sent1: The traditionless family created their own special holidays.
meanings.sent2: The traditionless culture welcomed new ideas and perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The traditionless museum displayed only contemporary art pieces.
meanings.sent4: His traditionless mind was open to all possibilities and innovations.
meanings.sent5: The traditionless town was a blank canvas for creativity and change.
